title: Data Rescue 4.3.1 – Powerful hard drive data recovery solution
content: Data Rescue is a robust and reliable data recovery solution for your Mac. title: Wi-Fi SpeedTest 2.1.1 – Test and troubleshoot your wifi network
content: Wi-Fi SpeedTest is available on Mac OS X and iOS. It will allow you to test and troubleshoot your wifi network. It will be very useful when you want to test bandwidth of your wifi, ethernet or mixed network, but your internet connection is too slow(for example 10 Megabits per second), and your router can […]

title: Quick Ringtone 1.0.1 – Easily create iPhone ringtones
content: DIY ringtone with music and recording.   Ringtone directly sync to iPhone by iTunes.   Share the ringtone with your friends at the touch of a button.   Version 1.0.1: Release notes were unavailable when this listing was updated.   OS X 10.10 or later, 64-bit processor

title: Quick Recorder 1.2.5 – A personal voice recorder app
content: Quick Recorder is now running. You can find its icon in the Dock. Click it to record, and click it again to stop. Right-click(or ⌘-click) the dock bar icon to show the menu.   Version 1.2.5: Context menu for list; Long name display; Fix bugs.   OS X 10.10 or later, 64-bit processor

title: Amberlight 2.1.0 – Unique fractal-flame generator
content: Amberlight 2 is a new release of art software which creates computer-generated images and animations. The beautiful connection of mathematics and art is a visualization of the algorithm based on magnetic fields developed by Peter Blaškovič. In the world of computer graphics this is a one-of-a-kind tool that broadens creative horizons and adds animated magic […]

title: AppDelete 4.3 – The speedy and efficient way to delete your unwanted apps
content: AppDelete is an uninstaller for Macs that will remove not only applications but also widgets, preference panes, plugins, and screensavers along with their associated files. Without AppDelete these associated items will be left behind to take up space and potentially cause issues.   There are several ways to activate AppDelete: Drag items onto main window […]

title: Lossless Photo Squeezer 1.70 – Reduce Image Size
